menu.label: ABOUT OUR CAFE
menu.text: Each morning we'll bring you freshly baked organic bagels, plenty of organic eggs and a fully loaded macrobiotic breakfast (including miso soup and old-fashioned oatmeal). We'll offer the highest quality, small production coffee drinks and teas. Feel free to check the internet on our wireless provider, read our array of daily newspapers and weekly magazines, or simply fuel up for the day while relaxing in a warm and upbeat environment.

menu.text:

menu.label: ABOUT OUR LUNCH
menu.text: Our lunch focuses on fast service for both dine-in and take-out customers. Daily, we'll offer two seasonal soups, a number of fresh greens, pizzas, and our signature Macro Bowl (rice, seasonal greens, protein, and sauce). Daily specials will include a variety of hot and cold sandwiches, pastas and fish. We continue to encourage our customers to relax and enjoy the space, including our outdoor patio seating, which will be available for use year-round (and best, of course, when the weather is nice).

menu.label: SEASONAL SOUPS
menu.text:
Cup $4 Bowl $6

Year-round we bring you our seasonal version of the Minestrone, Ribollita, or Aquacotta, all versions of classic Italian recipes.

[header]Minestrone[/header] with barlotti beans, cavolo nero, swiss chard, napa cabbage and tomatoes.

[header]Our second soup[/header] will traverse cultures and continents, brought to you by the whims of Chef Daniel Kedan.

menu.label: GREENS
menu.text:
Individual $5 Family $9[/header]

We offer a daily selection of salads and warm greens, Chosen with the intention to represent a seasonal blend, they will always be the freshest northern Cali greens available.

PL's Escarole Caesar[/header] Young escarole with fire roasted croutons, caesar dressing and Reggiano cheese

Gemischter Salat[/header] Bohemian Farm Collective winter greens, root vegetables, toasted pepitas and balsamic vinaigrette. [header]Add goat cheese for one buck[/header]

Baby Greens[/header] Tender head lettuces, avocado, pickled onion, shaved radish with black pepper buttermilk dressing and toasted pine nuts

Local Rapini[/header] braised with whole garlic, chile and anchovy finished with parmigiano reggiano and bread crumbs

Beans & Greens[/header] Daily beans with rotating braised greens

menu.label: OUR PIZZA
menu.text:
[header]13" Personal Size[/header]

[header]True Italian Pizza,[/header] baked on our 800-degree fire deck pizza hearth. We use a blend of organic whole wheat flour and Italian white flour. We also offer a soy-based cheese for all our vegans and dairy-conscious customers.

[header]Cipolla:[/header] Marinara, shaved Red Onion, Reggiano Parmigiano and Wild Arugula. [header]Add Local organic Egg 1. Add Proscuitto 2.[/header]

[header]Pizza Funghi:[/header] Maitake and King Trumpet Mushrooms, Caramelized Onion, Calabrian Chilis and Val d’ Aosta Fontina [header]15.[/header]

[header]Pizza ‘Scarole:[/header] Escarole, Caramelized Onions, Housemade Pork Sausage and Val d’ Aosta Fontina [header]15.[/header]

[header]Neapolitan:[/header] Fresh Marinara, fresh Mozzarella, fresh Basil [header]14.[/header]

[header]Pizza Salsiccia:[/header] Marinara, Spring Onion and Green Garlic, House Pork Sausage and Val d’ Aosta Fontina[header]15.[/header]

menu.label: ABOUT OUR WINE BAR
menu.text: Come hang out for wine tasting and antipasti, pizza and salad, or simply take it all to go. Each evening we'll offer fully assorted antipasti platters with a variety of home-marinated Italian delicacies. Evening specials will include risotto, pizzas, and handmade pastas. Enjoy a fairly priced selection from our list of sustainable, organic and biodynamically produced wines. Please come and enjoy a lively evening atmosphere and discover the best food, music and company West County has to offer.
